body:
Syntax: cast 'armor' <target>

Armor creates a magical protective field around the target, improving their
armor class by 2 points. This is one of the most fundamental protective 
spells and is essential for survival in combat.

Classes: Cleric, Mage
Level: 1 (Cleric), 4 (Mage)
Mana Cost: 5
Duration: 24 hours
Position: Standing or Fighting

The armor spell can be cast on yourself or others. It provides basic magical
protection and is often the first spell learned by spellcasters.

See Also: BLESS, SANCTUARY
